name: ArtofWar
0:
”Alexa, ask Sun Tzu to give me a quote”
”Alexa, ask Sun Tzu to share with me your wisdom”
”Alexa, ask Sun Tzu to make me wise”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sun tzu
des: Ask Sun Tzu to share with you his infinite wisdom. Learn to best your enemies with ease and grace by hearing quotes from Sun Tzu's seminal work, "The Art of War."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
